subcommands.name: create
subcommands.description: Create a new bet with a title and two options. There must be no active bet to create a new one.

options.name: option1
options.description: Name of the first bet option

options.name: option2
options.description: Name of the second bet option

subcommands.description: Close betting on the active bet. Requires an active bet with open betting.

image.alt: Closing betting on a bet with /bet close

subcommands.description: Place a bet on the active bet. Requires an active bet with open betting.

image.alt: Placing a bet on an active bet with /bet on

subcommands.description: Cancel and end the active bet with no payout. Can only be done by a server admin or the bet creator. Requires an active bet.

image.alt: Cancelling the active bet with /bet cancel

subcommands.description: End the bet with a winner. Requires an active bet.

options.name: winner
options.description: Option number of the bet winner

image.alt: Ending the active bet with /bet end

subcommands.description: Get a random League of Legends champion.

image.alt: Generating a random LoL champion with /random champion

subcommands.description: Get a random League of Legends item build.

image.alt: Generating a random LoL item build with /random items

subcommands.description: Flip a coin, heads or tails.

options.name: amount
options.description: Number of coins to flip (1-50, default 1)

options.name: sides
options.description: Number of sides on the die (4-20, default 6)

options.name: amount
options.description: Number of dice to roll (1-50, default 2)

regular_commands.name: Random
regular_commands.description: Get a random League of Legends champion.

image.alt: Generating a random LoL champion with {PREFIX}random
